description: This source file defines the WebhookSubscriptionRepository interface, which extends JpaRepository to handle database operations related to WebhookSubscription entities, including a custom method to find active webhook subscriptions for a specific partner.

classes.name: WebhookSubscriptionRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for managing WebhookSubscription entities, providing CRUD operations and a custom query method.

methods.name: findByPartnerAndActiveTrue
methods.description: A query method to retrieve all active webhook subscriptions associated with a specific partner.
